    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.Boolean checkAppointmentOverlap​(java.lang.Integer customerID, java.time.LocalDateTime appointmentStart, java.time.LocalDateTime appointmentEnd, java.time.LocalDate startDate, java.lang.Integer appointmentID)
      METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method takes the inputted start and end dateTimes and the customerID, generates an Observable List of appointments that have the same start date and customerID, checks if the list is empty, and if the list is empty, it checks for overlap between the appointment start and end times, and returns a boolean that is used to continue or generate an error in the OnClickSaveButton Method
      boolean checkBusinessHours​(java.time.LocalDateTime startDateTime, java.time.LocalDateTime endDateTime, java.time.LocalDate appointmentStartDate)
      METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method takes the inputted start and end dateTimes, converts the business hours from ETC to the users time zone, checks if they overlap outside of the business hours, and returns a boolean that is used to continue or generate an error in the OnClickSaveButton Method
      void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      LAMBDA EXPRESSION: A lambda expression is used to disable the ability to pick days in the past from the Date Pickers as dates for edited appointments.
      void OnClickBackButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method returns the user to the Appointment Page when they click the "Back" button
      void OnClickClearButton()
      METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method clears any values from the TextBoxes, ComboBoxes, and Date Pickers
      void OnClickSaveButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method gathers all of the inputted values, performs time conversions and logic checks that ensure the inputted times are within business hours and do not overlap with another appointment for the same customer, and calls the editAppointment database method that updates the selected appointment values into the database
      void populateAppointment​(Appointment selectedAppointment)
      METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method takes the selected appointment from the previous screen, performs time conversions and formatting, and populates the input fields

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        LAMBDA EXPRESSION: A lambda expression is used to disable the ability to pick days in the past from the Date Pickers as dates for edited appointments. For the end date Date Picker, it also does not allow the user to pick an end date from before the start date.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

      • populateAppointment

        public void populateAppointment​(Appointment selectedAppointment)
        METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method takes the selected appointment from the previous screen, performs time conversions and formatting, and populates the input fields

      • OnClickClearButton

        public void OnClickClearButton()
        METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method clears any values from the TextBoxes, ComboBoxes, and Date Pickers

      • OnClickSaveButton

        public void OnClickSaveButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException,
                              java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                              java.io.IOException
        METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method gathers all of the inputted values, performs time conversions and logic checks that ensure the inputted times are within business hours and do not overlap with another appointment for the same customer, and calls the editAppointment database method that updates the selected appointment values into the database
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • checkBusinessHours

        public boolean checkBusinessHours​(java.time.LocalDateTime startDateTime,
                                  java.time.LocalDateTime endDateTime,
                                  java.time.LocalDate appointmentStartDate)
        METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method takes the inputted start and end dateTimes, converts the business hours from ETC to the users time zone, checks if they overlap outside of the business hours, and returns a boolean that is used to continue or generate an error in the OnClickSaveButton Method

      • checkAppointmentOverlap

        public java.lang.Boolean checkAppointmentOverlap​(java.lang.Integer customerID,
                                                 java.time.LocalDateTime appointmentStart,
                                                 java.time.LocalDateTime appointmentEnd,
                                                 java.time.LocalDate startDate,
                                                 java.lang.Integer appointmentID)
                                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method takes the inputted start and end dateTimes and the customerID, generates an Observable List of appointments that have the same start date and customerID, checks if the list is empty, and if the list is empty, it checks for overlap between the appointment start and end times, and returns a boolean that is used to continue or generate an error in the OnClickSaveButton Method
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
